author: Stephanie Jordan
description: Apple brandy and honey are a natural fit and they nestle harmoniously with bitter zesty orange and enlivening dry sparkling wine.
name: Queen's Knees
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)
45 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
